ack.p: We thank Maarten Brugge and Anne Dekinga for excellent technical assistance at NIOZ, Francisco Encinas for help with the immune assays, Peter Klaver, Miriam Maas, Francisca Velkers and Josanne Verhagen for help with the sampling of blood, Pierrick Bocher (University of La Rochelle) and the wader-team of the Ligue de Protection des Oiseaux (LPO) in Rochefort for catching the 2009-cohort, and GwenaÃ«l Quaintenne for bringing the birds to The Netherlands after the catch.
